if dbo.AI_ERP$Function$CheckSQLInjection(@stt_rec) = 0 return declare @key varchar(128) select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' select rtrim(a.ma_nc) as ma_nc, rtrim(a.ma_px) as ma_px, rtrim(a.ma_lsx) as ma_lsx, rtrim(a.ma_cd) as ma_cd, rtrim(a.ma_ca) as ma_ca, a.ghi_chu, a.sl_nc , case when @@language = 'V' then b.ten_nc else b.ten_nc2 end as ten_nc , case when @@language = 'V' then c.ten_px else c.ten_px2 end as ten_px , case when @@language = 'V' then d.ten_lsx else d.ten_lsx2 end as ten_lsx , case when @@language = 'V' then f.ten_cd else f.ten_cd2 end as ten_cd , case when @@language = 'V' then g.ten_ca else g.ten_ca2 end as ten_ca , replace(str(day(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') day, replace(str(month(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') month, cast(year(a.ngay_ct) as char(4)) year from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join sfdmnc b on a.ma_nc = b.ma_nc left join sfdmxuong c on a.ma_px = c.ma_px left join cs2$000000 d on a.ma_lsx = d.ma_lsx left join sfctwo e on a.ma_cd = e.ma_cd and a.ma_lsx = e.ma_lsx left join ctrt f on e.ma_lo_trinh = f.ma_lo_trinh and e.ma_cd = f.ma_cd left join sfdmca g on a.ma_ca = g.ma_ca where a.stt_rec = @stt_rec exec rs_PrintS1Tran @@language, @key, 'ds1$$partition$current', @@id, 0
&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Declare; &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Select; &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result;
